description: The ID of the Import Purchase Order Close Lines request.
The memo for the Import Purchase Order Close Lines request.

Purchase_Order_LineObject.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

Purchase_Order_LineObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.
For types that require a parent reference, contains a unique identifier for an instance of a parent object.
For types that require a parent reference, the unique identifier type of a parent object.

Purchase_Order_LineObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

description: Container for the Purchase Order Line information, for the Purchase Order Line being closed.

validation.validation: You can't close [PO line] because the purchase order has not been issued: [PO]
You can't close this purchase order line because the associated receipt or receipt adjustment is draft or in progress: [PO Line]
You can't close the purchase order line because the associated supplier return is in draft or in progress: [PO line]
You can't close [PO line] because it's already closed or canceled.
You can't close [PO line] because an associated change order is in draft or in progress: [PO]
You can't close the purchase order line because the associated advanced ship notice is in draft or in progress: [PO line]
You can't close this purchase order line because the associated procurement card verification is in draft or in progress: [PO Line]
You can't close this purchase order line because the associated supplier invoice is in draft, in progress, or incomplete: [PO Line]
You can't close the purchase order line because it has an outstanding retention balance: [PO line]
You can't close the consignment purchase order line because the purchase order line quantity is greater than the related invoiced quantity: [PO line]
You can't close this purchase order line because it's for a contingent worker: [PO line]
